title: Trade Executed
description: Fired when a financial trade or investment order is executed.

instrument.description: The ticker symbol or asset identifier.

instrumentType.description: The type of financial instrument traded.

side.description: Whether the trade is a buy or sell.

price.description: The price per unit at execution.

total.description: The total monetary value of the trade.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

orderType.description: The type of order that was executed.

executionVenue.description: The exchange or venue where the trade was executed.

accountId.description: The trading or brokerage account identifier.
